d.Name: SAP ERP Integration with Salesforce.20.6.2023.11.52.44
d.Description:
This package supports the integration of some business processes between your Salesforce and your SAP ERP application. The included integration flows can be used as a starting point to accelerate your integration journey between SAP ERP and Salesforce.

It supports the following business transactions:

  • Receive Product Availability from SAP ERP.
  • Receive Sales Order History from SAP ERP.
  • Replicate Account from SAP ERP to Salesforce.
  • Replicate Product from SAP ERP to Salesforce.
  • Replicate Sales Contract from Salesforce to SAP ERP.
  • Replicate Sales Order from Salesforce to SAP ERP.
  • Replicate Sales Order from SAP ERP to Salesforce.
  • Replicate Sales Prices from SAP ERP to Salesforce.
  • Update Account from Salesforce to SAP ERP.

Version supported:  SAP ECC 6.0 and above release.
d.ShortText:
This integration package contains integration flows to replicates some Business objects between SAP ERP and Salesforce. 
The integration scope includes replication of objects data such as Product, Sales order, Account, Sales contract, etc.
d.Keywords: SAP Cloud Platform Integration Suite,SAP Cloud Platform Integration,SFDC
